mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (PHOTO, MEMBERTYPE_ID, MEMBERID, MEMBERPW, MEMBERNAME, GENDER_ID, BIRTHDATE, PHONENUMBER, MEMBERADDRESS, EMAIL, INTRODUCTION) VALUES ('png', #{auth}, #{username}, #{MEMBERPW}, #{MEMBERNAME}, #{GENDER_ID}, #{BIRTHDATE}, #{PHONENUMBER}, #{MEMBERADDRESS}, #{EMAIL}, 'null') ;
